message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to secure a good deal now than risk losing value with inflation.
I think we can both do better. I'm willing to give you a little more, but I need to get a fairer share. Let's split it 55/45.
Bob, the value is decreasing with every round. I'll take $55, you take $45.  Let's close this deal before we both lose more.
